page.title: 02Leisure Survey,(A),Tiptree
page.content: ON JULY 1ST JENNY, JANICEN, AND OUR HELPER, MRS.GUILFOYLE WENT ROUND TO VARIOUS HOUSES IN TIPTREE WHICH WERE INSIDE OUR RECTANGLE. THESE ARE SOME RESPONSES TO OUR QUESTIONS. WE ASKED {BRY MOGRIDGE}FIVE QUESTIONS ABOUT HER} LEISURE TIME.HERE ARE THE QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS."HOW MANY THINGS DO YOU DO IN YOUR LEISURE TIME?" SHE REPLIED "THREE". THEN WE SAID "WHAT IS THE MAIN THING YOU DO?" SHE REPLIED "COOKING". NEXT WE ASKED HER "HOW MANY THINGS DO YOU DO THAT COST MONEY?" "ONE" WAS THE ANSWER."WHAT IS IT?" WE INQUIRED."W.I." WAS THE REPLY."WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE THING YOU DO IN YOUR LEISURE TIME?" WE ASKED."GARDENING DEFINITELY"SHE REPLIED! {HELEN EASTBROOK}REPLIED "FIVE" WHEN WE ASKED HER "HOW MANY THINGS DO YOU DO IN YOUR LEISURE TIME?" SHE ANSWERED "NEEDLEWORK AND KNITTING"WHEN WE ASKED
